changeSet.author: Sudhamsh

preConditions.sqlCheck: select COUNT(*) from concept where concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN('Infections Opportunistes année','ARV','Autre traitement','Allergies','Allérgie type de réaction','Autre pathologies années','Chirurgicaux année','Obstétricaux Gestité','Obstétricaux Parité','Obstétricaux Fausses couches','Hématologique transfusion antérieures nbre ','Hématologique transfusion antérieures années','Hématologique Groupe Sanguin','Hématologique Rhésus','Traitement TB Antérieur','Nouveau patient','Historique TB antérieur(si traité précédemment)','Pulmonaire','Si prémature, nombre de semaines') and concept_name_type = 'FULLY_SPECIFIED' and locale = 'fr' and voided = 0);

changeSet.comment: Adding observation to All Observation Templates

changeSet.author: Sudhamsh

preConditions.sqlCheck: select COUNT(*) from concept where concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ('Poids Naissance') and concept_name_type = 'FULLY_SPECIFIED' and locale = 'fr' and voided = 0);

changeSet.sql: Update concept_numeric set units = 'Kgs' where concept_id = (select concept_id from concept_name where name = "Poids Naissance" and concept_name_type = 'FULLY_SPECIFIED' and locale = 'fr' and voided = 0);

changeSet.author: Sudhamsh

preConditions.sqlCheck: select COUNT(*) from concept_set cs where cs.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ('Allergies - medicaments') AND concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") and cs.concept_set IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = 'Informations allergies');

changeSet.comment: Removing Allergies - medicaments from Informations allergies

changeSet.author: Sudhamsh

preConditions.sqlCheck: select COUNT(*) from concept_set cs where cs.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ("Ligne d'ARV", 'Date début','ARV') AND concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") and cs.concept_set IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = 'Historique ARV');

changeSet.comment: Removing from Ligne dARV, Date début,ARV Historique ARV
